definitions.definition: Any of a group of steroid hormones , secreted by the adrenal cortex , that are involved in a large range of physiological systems.
Any of several synthetic hormones of related structure.

main_definition: ( biochemistry , steroids ) Any of a group of steroid hormones , secreted by the adrenal cortex , that are involved in a large range of physiological systems.
secondary_definitions: ( biochemistry , pharmacology ) Any of several synthetic hormones of related structure.
